title: Anti-banner for Opera 9.x  v.1.8
description:
Anti-banner for Opera 9. X v.1.8 is a script, cutting advertising and banners. Supplement does not require registration, automatically configured and most importantly - increases the speed of downloading pages while saving your traffic. 


The list of changes: 
[] Added scripts for easy jumps files from file-(author: Mikivanch) 
[] New types of ready-installation 
[! ] New blocking all the major files 
[! ] Small refinement is not the critical nature 
[! ] Dorabotan code installer and deinstallyatora (script v.1.7.2) 
During installation, you&#039;ll need to specify the path to the folder "profile". Where is the folder, you can look like this: in the control panel Opera push Help> About. 
Also during the installation will be asked to turn on / off Blocking settings. I recommend that all four - will be shut down at any moment.
